document.full_text: dutch authorities on thursday said they would destroy 8,800 chickens at an organic poultry farm in central netherlands after the discovery of bird flu, the second such case in two months.
document.title: dutch to cull 8,800 chickens in bird flu alert
lines_and_colors: dutch authorities on thursday said they would destroy 8,800 chickens at an organic poultry farm in central netherlands after the discovery of bird flu, the second such case in two months.
